schema.title: Base Vibe Structure
schema.description: The most fundamental structural definition for any Vibe, establishing its identity, type, and version.

id.title: Vibe ID
id.description: The unique identifier for this specific Vibe instance (e.g., aug:vibes/some-uuid).

type.title: Vibe Type
type.description: A string identifying the fundamental category or nature of the Vibe (e.g., 'RecordVibe', 'ProcessVibe', 'RoleVibe').

revision.title: Vibe Revision
revision.description: Tracks the version of this Vibe, incremented on significant changes.

branches.title: Vibe Branches
branches.description: The branches of this Vibe, used to partition changes.

prototype.title: Vibe Prototype
prototype.description: The prototype of this Vibe, used to create new instances.

instructions.title: Vibe Instructions
instructions.description: List of instruction vibes that were used to refine this vibe

capabilities.title: Vibe Capabilities
capabilities.description: List of capability vibes that were used to refine this vibe

createdAt.title: Creation Date
createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when this record was created.

updatedAt.title: Last Modified Date
updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the most recent modification to this record.

title.title: Display Name
title.description: A human-readable title for this Vibe.
